__e: His lordship is not at home, but if you will leave your name...
I come to you this morning not just as a landlady, not just as a friend, but as a shoulder on which to weep in this time of crisis.
Your Ladyship, no matter what you may think of me, you know I would not stand here and lie to you.
We have the testimony of his landlady and other people in the house who recalled his wife.
If that's how you want to play it, I'll give you until upstairs dinner has finished, after which I will ask to speak to Her Ladyship and I will tell her your story.
I've never done that in my life, Your Ladyship, and I don't see why I should start now.
